Lesson 10 - 3D graphics concepts, Online interactive 3D geometry with Sketchfab

You made it to the last day!! Hurray you did it!!

Resources

Kepler Planets info

  • Exoplanet Archive - see “Data –> Confirmed Planets” option (hover over “Data”)
  • Exoplanet orbit database (deprecated, but with plots)
  • astroquery API

Python Library downloads

  • Hermite Sims Library (hermite_library.py)
  • Conversions Library (convert_kepler_data.py)

Data Downloads

  • We’ll be using this NASA planet database CSV file (planets_2020.06.22_10.10.17.csv) today.
  • And this set of simulated orbits (data.zip, 81M) today,
  • And this this set of generic planet 3D model files today.

Reading

  1. This short Pixar explaination of rendering
  2. Info about the Sketchfab platform

Where to go from here

Other Dataviz Courses/Resources

  • Idyll - Markdown to HTML pages
  • Iodide - online notebooks (not all Python libraries supported at the moment)

Programming Resources

  • Datacamp - Python
  • Software Carpentry’s Python Lesson

More advanced programming
